name: Angel Healthcare Investors
overview:
Angel Healthcare Investors, LLC is a Boston-based group of proven executives and entrepreneurs seeking investment opportunities in early-stage healthcare and life sciences companies. From healthcare services to biotechnology and medical devices, Angel Healthcare targets investments in companies that clearly add value by addressing demonstrated customer needs.

Comprised of over 45 sophisticated, accredited investors, Angel Healthcare is highly committed to helping companies with solid business models tackle strategic and execution challenges, and maximize the likelihood of their success.
